articles.title: How Russia captured 'prized' city of Mariupol after weeks of intense fighting - Times of India
articles.description: Europe News: NEW DELHI: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Thursday claimed victory in the strategic port of Mariupol, even as he ordered his troops not to storm .

articles.title: Astronomers Discover Micronovae: A New Kind of Thermonuclear Stellar Explosion - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A team of astronomers, with the help of the European Southern Observatory’s Very Large Telescope (ESO’s VLT), have observed a new type of stellar explosion — a micronova. These outbursts happen on the surface of certain stars, and can each burn through around…

articles.title: EU plan for common worldwide phone charger port takes step closer - CNA
articles.description:
BRUSSELS: The European Union's bid to adopt a common charging port for mobile phones, tablets and headphones took a step forward on Wednesday (Apr 20) when an EU panel backed the proposal, paving the way for an assembly vote next month.
